name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior JavaScript Engineer with 8 years of expertise, I excel in leveraging **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Vue.js**, and **Node.js** to develop scalable, high-performance web applications. My proficiency extends to modern web standards, including **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and ECMAScript versions 5 and 6, ensuring the creation of seamless user experiences.

I also have considerable experience with **Git** for version control, and I am well-versed in build tools such as **Gulp** and **Webpack** for streamlined development processes. My solid understanding of **microservices architecture** supports my capability to design robust, secure applications tailored to complex business needs.

In previous roles, I have successfully integrated behavior-driven development practices, enhancing collaboration within teams and improving code quality with frameworks like **Playwright** for testing. Throughout my career, I've demonstrated a commitment to continuous learning and adapting to new technologies while delivering enterprise-level solutions that meet industry standards.
